keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.MVD

Class MVD

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.Basic.Discretizer
      • keel.Algorithms.Discretizers.MVD.MVD

  • public class MVD
extends Discretizer

    This class implements the UCPD algorithm

    Since:
    JDK1.6

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Julian Luengo (SCI2S research group, DECSAI in ETSIIT, University of Granada), 18/04/2011
